verifyProviderDropDownIsDisabledIfGetQuo.description: Test Case 119337:Verify if 'Get Quotes' button is available then Provider dropdown is disabled

verifyGenericPunchoutPartProvidersWithTh.description: Test Case 119339:Verify all generic/punchout part providers that have the same repair locations or have the same Area as selected Repair Order are presented ("Get Quotes" button is enabled)

verifyWarningMessageIsShownAfterClicking.description: Test Case 119396:Verify when user clicks 'Get Quote' and there is no available Part Providers message is shown

verifyWarningMessageIsDisplayedForGeneri.description: Verify user sees the warning message If selected Generic Part Provider has no email address and part will be set as received and povider will be stored

targetProcessTestCaseData.testCaseTitle: Verify user sees the warning message If part will be set as received and povider will be stored

verifyPartProviderFieldIsFilledAndUserCa.description: Verify the Part Provider field is filled and user can't change it when the part is quoted

targetProcessTestCaseData.testCaseTitle: Verify the Part Provider field is filled and user can't change it when the part is quoted

verifyPartProviderIsEmptyAfterAddingNewP.description: Verify part provider dropdown will be empty by default when the user adds the service

targetProcessTestCaseData.testCaseTitle: Verify part provider dropdown will be empty by default when the user adds the service

verifyUserCanManuallySelectPartProviderF.description: Verify user can manually select part provider from the dropdown when BO features "Punchout Part Providers" and "Parts Ordering - Generic" are disabled

targetProcessTestCaseData.testCaseTitle: Verify user can manually select part provider from the dropdown when BO features "Punchout Part Providers" and "Parts Ordering - Generic" are disabled

verifyAvailablePartProvidersAfterClickin.description: Verify the list of available part providers when a user clicks "Get Quote" button(only contain configured for RO location Punch-Out and Generic providers)

targetProcessTestCaseData.testCaseTitle: Verify the list of available part providers when a user clicks "Get Quote" button(only contain configured for RO location Punch-Out and Generic providers)
